name: http-proxy-middleware
description: The one-liner node.js proxy middleware for connect, express and browser-sync

scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --recursive --reporter spec && istanbul-coveralls && npm run clean
